divs: Sighting Detailsthis morning i witnessed a ufo. i went to my back door to let in my cats. i looked into the shy as day was dawning and saw a very bright object. it changed shape a couple of times. some moments it appeared as a cross, some moments it appeared as a disk with 2 light rays shooting from the top. there were occaisonal dimmer lights moving to and from the object. it also had 2 lines shooting out from the sides. the 2 bars of light from the top were red and blue and formed a V shape, the 2 on the sides were blue. it also would flash lights brighter than itself, and it was very bright. i got goose bumps when i realised it wasnt a star. and as it would change, i had fear mixed with excitement. as it stands it is still out there. dimmer, but still clearly visible. i just went out to look at the object again, it is gone now, but there are no less than 5 con trails in the air above my home. i also saw a very bright, glowing whit object flying at an incredible rate of speed over my home that left a contrail. it could have been a jet, but ive never seen a jet like it before. it was extremely bright. it looks as if i wasnt the only one that noticed(air force?) im going back out to look for further activity. it is now 5:41. 2 more jets over head one was easoly identifiable as a jet heading after the extremely bright object that left the contrail. something is happening here.
Summary: bright sparkling. changed shape. sometimes a cross. ha 2 light rays shooting out the top.
trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Bowling Green
